name: Opening Wound
desc: <blue>[Combat Start]</blue> If enemy >= 80% HP, +20% DMG and inflict 1 stack of Bleeding after every hit.
components: (unit2.get_hp() >= unit2.get_stat('HP')*0.8) and (unit2.team not in ['player', 'other']) and (mode == 'attack' or (mode != 'attack' and combat_calcs.can_counterattack(unit2, unit2.get_weapon(), unit1, unit1.get_weapon())))
